com.bonitasoft.engine.api

Interface ThemeAPI

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ThemeAPI

    public interface ThemeAPI
extends ThemeAPI
    Manage mobile and portal theme
    Author:
    Celine Souchet

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Theme restoreDefaultTheme(ThemeType type)
      Restore the default theme.
      Theme setCustomTheme(byte[] content, byte[] cssContent, ThemeType type)
      Update a custom theme, if it exists; otherwise create it.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.bonitasoft.engine.api.ThemeAPI

        getCurrentTheme, getDefaultTheme, getLastUpdateDate

    • Method Detail

      • setCustomTheme

        Theme setCustomTheme(byte[] content,
                   byte[] cssContent,
                   ThemeType type)
                     throws SetThemeException
        Update a custom theme, if it exists; otherwise create it.
        Parameters:
        content - The zip file associated with this theme, as a binary content.
        cssContent - The CSS file associated with this theme, as a binary content.
        type - The type of the theme
        Returns:
        The current theme
        Throws:
        SetThemeException - If can't set theme
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.2

      • restoreDefaultTheme

        Theme restoreDefaultTheme(ThemeType type)
                          throws RestoreThemeException
        Restore the default theme. Delete the custom theme.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of the theme to restore
        Returns:
        The default theme
        Throws:
        RestoreThemeException - If can't restore default theme
        Since:
        6.2
